Class: Tooltip

DrawerJs.utilPlugins. Tooltip

new Tooltip(element, optionsopt) → {DrawerJs.utilPlugins.Tooltip.returnObj}

Plugin that provide ability to create tooltip for any element. Position/styles of tooltip are configurable. Can be used as jQuery plugin - $.fn.DrawerTooltip
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
element HTMLElement trigger element
options DrawerJs.utilPlugins.Tooltip.defaultOptions <optional>
 configuration object
Source:
  • toolbars/ui-plugins/ToolbarTooltip.js, line 24
Returns:
Type
DrawerJs.utilPlugins.Tooltip.returnObj

Methods

adjustPosition(positionStringopt, $triggeropt)

Adjust tooltip position
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
positionString String | undefined <optional>
 Position of tooltip. Any combination of left/right/center for horizontal and top/bottom/center for vertical. Valid values - "left", "right top", "bottom left", "top center", "top", etc.
$trigger jQuery <optional>
 trigger element
Source:
  • toolbars/ui-plugins/ToolbarTooltip.js, line 267

destroy()

Destroy current instance of tooltip. Remove all elements and detach events.
Source:
  • toolbars/ui-plugins/ToolbarTooltip.js, line 339

Hide tooltip
Source:

showTooltip($triggeropt)

Show tooltip
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
$trigger jQuery <optional>
 trigger element. For correct positioning

Type Definitions

defaultOptions

Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Default Description
defaultClass String "editable-canvas-tooltip" Tooltip class
defaultPositionX String "center" Default horizontal position. Can be left/right/center
defaultPositionY String "bottom" Default vertical position. Can be top/left/center
additionalClass String Tooltip additional class
text String Text of tooltip
styleObj Object Any valid css object
style String inline style of tooltip. Will be overrided if styleObj is defined
position String Position of tooltip. Any combination of left/right/center for horizontal and top/bottom/center for vertical. Valid values - "left", "right top", "bottom left", "top center", "top", etc.
$tooltipWrapper jQuery Wrapper element for tooltip
tooltipWrapperSelector String Selector of wrapper element for tooltip. Will be overrided if $tooltipWrapper if defined.
Source:
  • toolbars/ui-plugins/ToolbarTooltip.js, line 42

returnObj

Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Description
instance DrawerJs.utilPlugins.Tooltip Instance of tooltip plugin
$trigger jQuery Trigger element
destroy DrawerJs.utilPlugins.Tooltip#destroy Destroy instance
adjustPosition DrawerJs.utilPlugins.Tooltip#adjustPosition Refresh/change position
hideTooltip DrawerJs.utilPlugins.Tooltip#hideTooltip Hide tooltip func
showTooltip DrawerJs.utilPlugins.Tooltip#showTooltip Show tooltip func
